hotels.vendor_name: Hotel Hospes Palau de la Mar
hotels.title: Valencia Five-Star Boutique Stay within a 19th-Century Manor House
hotels.description: Trace your way to Valencia on the coast of Spain where a palatial, five-star stay at Hospes Palau de La Mar awaits. This glamorous boutique hotel housed in a 19th-century manor exudes sophistication and charm from all angles, and the striking lobby boasting pristine white pillars is sure to impress. Indulge in a treatment at the Bodyna Spa, savour a refreshing horchata and Mediterranean cuisine at Ampar Restaurant, or venture out to explore high-end boutiques outside your doorstep.
